description: A security guard in a nightclub wouldn´t be exactly my dream job. However, for some guys it is. I was impressed by his appearance when he came into the room. He looked muscular, very fit and obviously he had a fable for army clothes. Not bad. But what surprised me most was that he had a rather friendly character which is more or less unusual for people who want to work in this business. And he worked in a similar position before. When I told him about the salary he was really excited. He honestly mentioned the word "dreamjob". So I thought, well, if that was his dream job then he should be able and willing to do something to get it, shouldn´t he? And I was surprised how easy it was to convince him to show me his body.
title: Dirty Scout 22
